description:
Unpredictable summer days need great shorts that are ready for the trail and the playground. The Scout Shorts' Fair Trade certified and Bluesign fabric packs down small and dries quickly, great for heading to camp or running through sprinklers. Lots of pocket space keep camp essentials close and even give the option of going pack-less on short hikes.

  • Lightweight recycled nylon ripstop is tough and dries quickly
  • DWR finish helps these shorts brush off dust from the trail and shed light rain
  • Stealthy internal elastic waistband for a perfect fit
  • Thigh pocket has a zippered closure for added security
  • Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: MEC Scout Shorts - Youths
